Message:
The lord readied his staff,
but he started to collapse,
still feelin’ the effects
of the flames.

I held the lord up with
one hand, and reached
for his staff with the other.

If just one of us ain’t gonna
cut it, then I’ll lend you
my power too...

Let’s do this, Lord...!
Miss Val, come back to us!
Return to the gentle person
ya once were!

In an instant, rays of light
poured down around us.

They gently put out the flames,
and soothed Miss Val’s heart.

I quickly rushed over to her...
but she just shook off my hand.

Her eyes were still ragin’ with
dark flames...
